word_mean: 霍乱：一种急传染性肠炎，有时呈暴发性，流行于印度及东南亚，并间歇地传布于世界其他地区，包括中东、非洲及南欧，形成流行和大流行态势。霍乱弧菌(Vibrio cholerae)在小肠产生强烈的肠毒素(霍乱原)，作用于小肠上皮细胞，使粘膜表面分泌大量等渗液体。严重病例的极期，可因剧烈无痛性水泻排出颇具诊断意义的米泔汁样粪便导致大量胃肠液丧失、盐缺失、酸中毒及休克
肌痉挛以及典型的微弱的高调语音。霍乱通过被粪污染的水及食物而传布。又称Asiatic c.
感染霍乱弧菌引起的烈性传染病。

sentence.Network_en: Conditions were ripe for an outbreak of cholera.
An inoculation against cholera is recommended.
sentence.Network_cn: 建议注射预防霍乱的疫苗。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (originally denoting bile and later applied to various ailments involving vomiting and diarrhoea): from Latin (see choler). The current sense dates from the early 19th cent

entry.def: Cholera is a serious disease that often kills people. It is caused by drinking infected water or by eating infected food.

means.word_mean: 1. an acute intestinal infection caused by ingestion of contaminated water or food

auth_sentence.content: Cholera can kill within a matter of hours.
auth_sentence.res_content: Cholera can kill within a matter of hours.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Cholera can kill within a matter of hours.

auth_sentence.content: But cholera is something that can affect anybody.
auth_sentence.res_content: But cholera is something that can affect anybody.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But cholera is something that can affect anybody.

auth_sentence.content: Our concern now is whether it can be cholera outbreak.
auth_sentence.res_content: Our concern now is whether it can be cholera outbreak.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Our concern now is whether it can be cholera outbreak.

sentences.en: Cholera has carried off half the people in the village.
sentences.cn: 霍乱夺走了村里一半人的生命。

sentences.en: Cholera spread like wildfire through the camps.
sentences.cn: 霍乱在营地里迅速传播。

sentences.en: The cholera outbreak has been contained.
sentences.cn: 霍乱的发生已被控制住了。
